item.description:
We'll check in with each other next Tuesday to see where we are with procrastination and/or clutter. Then each person will get a chance to talk about a specific annoyance they'd like to overcome and if they have any idea about how to accomplish that. They can ask for suggestions from the group.

Then there will be an open discussion depending on the group's interests. It is possible that some attendees will find accountability buddies or group members will to lend a hand.

Please bring in questions and any interesting resources (articles, links, books, people, etc.).

If you want to have something to eat or drink, please come a little early so we can start promptly.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a sign saying METROWEST P & C
item.name: April Round Table on Procrastination and Clutter
